item.title: Advanced Mathematical Structures
item.description: The course contains a broad set of intermediate and advanced level topics in Algebra and Combinatorics. The course is intended to: i.) refresh the basic topics learnt in S1-S4 ii.) solve advanced problems on the basic topics iii.) introduce some newer topics which was not covered in S1-S4. Grading Assignment Tests: 20% Practice problems will be given after each lecture. There will be a test based on practice problems once in a quarter (4 in total) with 5 marks each.

item.title: Probability & Statistics
item.description: A first undergraduate course in probability and statistics with a focus on discrete spaces.
